SageTVPlugin.Name: GKusnick's Studio Plugin Framework
SageTVPlugin.Description:
A plugin framework for SageTV Studio. Using this framework, plugin developers coding in Java can create Studio plugins that extend the Studio user interface with custom commands and menus.
(For Studio geeks only; there are no end-user features in this plugin.)
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
Hotkeys now work correctly without having to open the Plugins menu first.
Note that the framework architecture has been revamped for SageTV V7. Existing Studio plugins will need to be recoded for compatibility.
SageTVPlugin.Author: GKusnick
